SELECT MAP.SCHEDULE_CD , MAP.COMPANY_CD , MAP.IF_CD as SERVICE_ID , MAP.IF_PARENT_CD , MAP.REQUIRED_YN , MAP.IF_METHOD , 'S' AS ITEM_TYPE , FN_GET_SYSTEM_CONFIG(MAP.COMPANY_CD, 'CLOUD_SERVER_URL') AS URL , FN_GET_SYSTEM_CONFIG(MAP.COMPANY_CD, 'TOMS_FTA_CERT_KEY') AS TOMS_FTA_CERT_KEY , C.BUSINESS_NO , COALESCE(MAP.VALID_CHECK_YN, 'Y') AS VALID_CHECK_YN FROM INTERFACE_SCHEDULE_MAPPING MAP INNER JOIN INTERFACE_SCHEDULE SCH ON SCH.SCHEDULE_CD = MAP.SCHEDULE_CD AND SCH.COMPANY_CD = MAP.COMPANY_CD AND SCH.SYSTEM_BATCH_YN = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(NOW(),'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN SCH.APPLY_FROM_DATE AND SCH.APPLY_TO_DATE LEFT JOIN COMPANY C ON C.COMPANY_CD = MAP.COMPANY_CD WHERE MAP.SCHEDULE_CD = #SCHEDULE_CD# AND MAP.COMPANY_CD = #COMPANY_CD#
AND MAP.IF_CD = #TARGET_IF_CD#
AND MAP.IF_METHOD NOT IN('U', 'E') ORDER BY MAP.SCHEDULE_SEQ

SELECT SM.COMPANY_CD ,SH.SERVICE_HISTORY_ID ,SH.INTERFACE_HISTORY_ID ,SM.SERVICE_ID ,SP.PLAN_NO ,SP.IF_CD ,IIM.FILE_PATH ,SP.INTERFACE_MTH ,SP.PROCESS_TYPE ,SP.DATA_PATH ,SP.TRAN_ROW_NUM ,SP.SERVER_ID ,SP.ATTRIBUTE02 AS REQ_DATA_FORMAT ,SP.ATTRIBUTE01 AS RES_DATA_FORMAT ,SM1.SERVER_IP ,SM1.SERVER_PORT ,SM1.ATTRIBUTE01 AS SERVER_TYPE ,SM1.ATTRIBUTE02 AS SECURE_YN ,SM1.ATTRIBUTE03 AS PROXY_IP ,SM1.ATTRIBUTE04 AS PROXY_PORT ,SM1.ATTRIBUTE05 AS DATA_SOURCE ,SM1.ATTRIBUTE06 AS PROTOCAL ,SM1.CURRENT_STAT ,SM1.USE_YN AS SERVER_USE_YN FROM SERVICE_MST SM INNER JOIN SERVICE_PLAN SP ON SP.COMPANY_CD = SM.COMPANY_CD AND SP.SERVICE_ID = SM.SERVICE_ID
AND SP.SERVER_ID = #SERVER_ID#
INNER JOIN INTERFACE_ITEM_MST IIM ON IIM.COMPANY_CD = SP.COMPANY_CD AND IIM.IF_CD = SP.IF_CD AND IIM.USING_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN SERVER_MST SM1 ON SM1.COMPANY_CD = SP.COMPANY_CD AND SM1.SERVER_ID = SP.SERVER_ID INNER JOIN SERVICE_HISTORY SH ON SH.COMPANY_CD = SP.COMPANY_CD AND SH.SERVICE_HISTORY_ID = #SERVICE_HISTORY_ID#::numeric AND SH.SERVER_ID = SP.SERVER_ID AND SH.PLAN_NO = SP.PLAN_NO
AND SH.TRANS_STATUS = #TRANS_STATUS#
WHERE SM.COMPANY_CD = #COMPANY_CD# AND SM.SERVICE_ID = #SERVICE_ID# ORDER BY SP.PLAN_NO
sqlMap.update: INSERT INTO SERVICE_HISTORY (COMPANY_CD ,SERVICE_HISTORY_ID ,INTERFACE_HISTORY_ID ,SERVICE_ID ,SERVER_IP ,SERVER_PORT ,SERVER_TYPE ,SECURE_YN ,PROXY_IP ,PROXY_PORT ,DATA_SOURCE ,PROTOCAL ,PLAN_NO ,IF_CD ,INTERFACE_MTH ,SERVER_ID ,PROCESS_TYPE ,DATA_PATH ,SCHEDULE_CD ,REQUEST_PARAM ,TRANS_STATUS ,CREATE_DATE ,CREATE_BY ,UPDATE_DATE ,UPDATE_BY) SELECT SM.COMPANY_CD ,#SERVICE_HISTORY_ID#::numeric AS SERVICE_HISTORY_ID ,NEXTVAL('SEQ_INTERFACE_HISTORY_01') AS INTERFACE_HISTORY_ID ,SM.SERVICE_ID ,SM1.SERVER_IP ,SM1.SERVER_PORT ,SM1.ATTRIBUTE01 AS SERVER_TYPE ,SM1.ATTRIBUTE02 AS SECURE_YN ,SM1.ATTRIBUTE03 AS PROXY_IP ,SM1.ATTRIBUTE04 AS PROXY_PORT ,SM1.ATTRIBUTE05 AS DATA_SOURCE ,SM1.ATTRIBUTE06 AS PROTOCAL ,SP.PLAN_NO ,SP.IF_CD ,SP.INTERFACE_MTH ,SP.SERVER_ID ,SP.PROCESS_TYPE ,SP.DATA_PATH ,#SCHEDULE_CD# AS SCHEDULE_CD ,NULL AS REQUEST_PARAM ,'1' AS TRANS_STATUS ,now()::timestamp ,'batch' ,now()::timestamp ,'batch' FROM SERVICE_MST SM INNER JOIN SERVICE_PLAN SP ON SP.COMPANY_CD = SM.COMPANY_CD AND SP.SERVICE_ID = SM.SERVICE_ID INNER JOIN SERVER_MST SM1 ON SM1.COMPANY_CD = SP.COMPANY_CD AND SM1.SERVER_ID = SP.SERVER_ID WHERE SM.COMPANY_CD = #COMPANY_CD# AND SM.SERVICE_ID = #SERVICE_ID# ORDER BY SP.PLAN_NO

UPDATE SERVICE_HISTORY SH SET INTERFACE_HISTORY_ID = NEXTVAL('SEQ_INTERFACE_HISTORY_01') ,TRANS_STATUS = '1' ,CREATE_DATE = NOW() ,UPDATE_DATE = NOW() FROM ( SELECT SH.COMPANY_CD ,SH.SERVICE_HISTORY_ID ,SH.PLAN_NO FROM SERVICE_HISTORY SH WHERE SH.COMPANY_CD = #COMPANY_CD# AND SH.SERVICE_HISTORY_ID = #SERVICE_HISTORY_ID#::numeric ORDER BY SH.PLAN_NO ) S WHERE SH.COMPANY_CD = S.COMPANY_CD AND SH.SERVICE_HISTORY_ID = S.SERVICE_HISTORY_ID AND SH.PLAN_NO = S.PLAN_NO

UPDATE SERVICE_HISTORY SET UPDATE_DATE = NOW()
,TRANS_STATUS = #TRANS_STATUS#
,REQUEST_PARAM = #REQUEST_PARAM:CLOB#
WHERE COMPANY_CD = #COMPANY_CD# AND SERVICE_HISTORY_ID = #SERVICE_HISTORY_ID#::numeric AND INTERFACE_HISTORY_ID = #INTERFACE_HISTORY_ID#::numeric
sqlMap.select: SELECT IH.RECEIVE_PARAM FROM INTERFACE_HISTORY IH WHERE IH.COMPANY_CD = #COMPANY_CD# AND IH.PARENT_HISTORY_ID = #SERVICE_HISTORY_ID#::numeric AND IH.SUBMIT_STATUS = 'R' LIMIT 1

SELECT IHD.* FROM INTERFACE_HISTORY IH INNER JOIN INTERFACE_HISTORY_DATA IHD ON IHD.COMPANY_CD = IH.COMPANY_CD AND IHD.INTERFACE_HISTORY_ID = IH.INTERFACE_HISTORY_ID AND IHD.INTERFACE_HISTORY_DATA_ID = #OBJECT_NAME# INNER JOIN SERVICE_HISTORY SH ON SH.COMPANY_CD = IH.COMPANY_CD AND SH.SERVICE_HISTORY_ID = IH.PARENT_HISTORY_ID AND SH.INTERFACE_HISTORY_ID = IH.INTERFACE_HISTORY_ID WHERE IHD.COMPANY_CD = #COMPANY_CD# AND IH.PARENT_HISTORY_ID = #SERVICE_HISTORY_ID#::numeric
